returns._0: the address of the signer as well as the hash of the struct

escrowFunds(bytes,bytes).notice: The function shall verify the json's autheticity, that the order was not already submitted. Then, check the validity of the source chain id and escrow the user's tokens.

restituateFunds(bytes32).notice: The function shall return the locked funds of the solver to the owner address

verifySignature(bytes,bytes).notice: Function that verifies the signature according to the EIP-712 proposal.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,bytes memory) view external returns (address,bytes32)

documentation.text:
@dev Call the function internally to complete the order
 @param _jsonHash : hash of the json struct containing the order information
